Items.m_Sentances: Damn these are the creatures I warned you about before.
Red Knights bearers of the cursed crystal
All I hear are grunts, what are they saying?
They are demanding I meet with their master.
Ask them who that is.This is a rare situation we need to gather information
Who is your master? I will not go with you unless I get an anwser
Our liege is a being that surpassssess strength. He is the Infernal torrent the god who does not need a name
They said their master is someone without a name, but his title is Infernal torrent
That doesnt do us much good
Do not missunndderssttannddd We do not need yoouuurrr body. Alll we need is youuur heart.
